titleStmt.title: Elegie on the untimely death of the incomparably valiant and noble, Francis, Lord Villiers, brother to the Duke of Buckingham. Slaine by the rebells neere Kingstone upon Thames, July the 7. 1648.

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Reader! who here lies dead, may give".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
